name: Lakwin Aviation
about: Lakwin Flight Academy, part of Lakwin Aviation, is a flying training organization approved by the Civil Aviation Authority of Sri Lanka. We provide the finest quality flight training with a highly experienced team of aviation professionals. Our leadership includes Mr. Lakshitha Weerasinghe, the Founder, and Captain B.C.H. Perera, the Head of Training and Director of Operations, who has over 14,000 to 15,000 flying hours. We offer courses for Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), Airline Transport Pilot Licence (ATPL), Instrument Rating (IR), Multi Engine Rating (MER), and Assistant Flight Instructor Rating (AFI). With state-of-the-art facilities and a well-maintained fleet of aircraft, we are committed to delivering safe and comprehensive training to aspiring pilots. Our goal is to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary for a successful career in aviation.
